trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The sprightly Loporrit has lost track of their friends, and could use a helping hand.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_TODO_00<tab>Search for and aid wayward Loporrits.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_TODO_01<tab>Search for more wayward Loporrits.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the reeling Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_TODO_03<tab>Report to the sprightly Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_000<tab>You're that visitor everyone's been talking about. I don't suppose you have time to assist me in a matter of life and death?
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_001<tab>Four of my friends went out to patrol the moon and mine for ore. They should be back by now, but... Well, I'm worried something happened!

TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_002<tab>I can't say I'm too keen on the idea of coming face-to-facelike-growth with one of those roving fungi by myself, though. Could you come along? Please come along...
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_004<tab>Thank you! Let's hop to it, then. My friends were headed toward the Chlorophosgrot.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_005<tab>Sweet Mother Hydaelyn! I hope they're all right...
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_DIZZYLOPORRIT04249_000_010<tab>...Guh? Wha? Why are you...?
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_DIZZYLOPORRIT04249_000_011<tab>I-I'm not slacking! I, erm...passed out after a weeper ambushed me. Yes, that's definitely what happened.

TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_DIZZYLOPORRIT04249_000_012<tab>If you're looking for the others, they went ahead to survey the Chlorophosgrot and the area around the Cradle of Darkness. I'd get them myself, but I'm much too laz─er, that is, exhausted from my encounter with the weeper.

TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_DIZZYLOPORRIT04249_000_013<tab>The others are either there in the Chlorophosgrot or near the Cradle of Darkness... I'm sure they're fine, though. They're nowhere near as, uh...exhausted...as I am.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_014<tab>...Do you hear intermittent snoring?
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_020<tab>This hole sure is deep. Drop a rock in there, and you'll never hear it hit the bottom...
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_021<tab>Oh, it's you! Is something the matter?
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_022<tab>Eep! Sorry for the bother─I didn't realize I'd been gone so long. I'll head back right away.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_023<tab>Mining makes me so...so sleepy. Must...stay...awake...
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_024<tab>...Hmmm? Oh, is it time to go back already? I hardly got anything done. Oh well!

TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_NUMBLOPORRIT04249_000_025<tab>I'm sure this plant wasn't here last time... Well, would you look at that, it's made my paw all tingly. Numb, even... Surely there's some use for this!
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_NUMBLOPORRIT04249_000_026<tab>Goodness me! Time to head back, is it? I was so focused, I completely lost track of time.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_026<tab>How far down could that hole go, I wonder?
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_PLUMPLOPORRIT04249_000_027<tab><yawn> Maybe I'll get some proper mining done next time.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_NUMBLOPORRIT04249_000_028<tab>I can't feel my arm now. But it still moves, so it's fine, right? ...Right?
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_DIZZYLOPORRIT04249_000_030<tab>I feel much better after that brief and totally regulation-compliant break. Let's head back and sift through the spoils of our expedition!
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_031<tab>I hope they don't think you're impressed by their shenanigans... <sigh> Honestly!
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_040<tab>Thanks again for helping me round everyone up. I'm glad no one was hurt...

TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_041<tab>They were lucky this time, but with those fungi and other odd creatures out there, I think we'll have to reconsider our patrol routes from now on. For a mercy, there are plenty of places to mine for ore nearby.
TEXT_AKTKZE010_04249_BRISKLYLOPORRIT04249_000_042<tab>Before you go, I'd like you to have this. Don't be a stranger!
